entry.title: Country Pine by Allie Boss Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Country Pine is a breath of fresh air. The crisp blend of fir, cedar, and blue spruce paired with orange zest and sweet berries are like a peaceful walk through the woods on a cool evening. With lavender and sandalwood, it’s a soothing invitation to take it slow, and enjoy the quiet moments of home in the countryside. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Allie @alliemboss!

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total). This fruity and fresh fragrance features a moderate strength and a refreshing blend of fir, cedar, and blue spruce with crisp, sugared notes of orange zest and fresh berries, highlighted by soothing lavender and sandalwood.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Country Pine & Tree Farm Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Enjoy two candles in our Country Pine by Allie Boss & Tree Farm Bundle. These fragrances each feature a unique blend of fresh and woodsy notes that are perfect for enjoying the slow, quiet moments, building memories at home.

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

Tree Farm: Fraser fir, evergreens, + cedarwood (strong strength)
Country Pine: spruce, orange, + lavender (moderate strength)

BURN TIME: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total).

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”


Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Country Home by Allie Boss Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame in newly reimagined Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Country Home is the feeling of “home, sweet home.” The sweet scents of apple and pear highlighted by nostalgic cedar and pine are like driving along the back roads of the countryside, between orchards and woods that lead to a cozy happy place full of love, warmth, and a little bit of spice.

With just 6-12 wax cubes in your warmer, this fruity and spiced fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly blends warm and bright notes to create a uniquely festive, cozy space you’ll love. 

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.

WEIGHTS: 4.0 oz (113.4 g)
DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"

Country Home is the feeling of “home, sweet home.” The sweet scents of apple and pear highlighted by nostalgic cedar and pine are like driving along the back roads of the countryside, between orchards and woods that lead to a cozy happy place full of love, warmth, and a little bit of spice. entry.title: Country Home by Allie Boss 8 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 8 oz Candle
Price: 28.00

Country Home is the feeling of “home, sweet home.” The sweet scents of apple and pear highlighted by nostalgic cedar and pine are like driving along the back roads of the countryside, between orchards and woods that lead to a cozy happy place full of love, warmth, and a little bit of spice.

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 40 hours of burn time. This fruity and bakey fragrance features a moderate strength that showcases a vibrant medley of sweet red apple and succulent pear with warm, spiced notes of clove and cinnamon, highlighted by a nostalgic blend of cedar, sandalwood, and pine.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 6.9 oz (195.8 g)

DIMENSIONS: 3.5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy Country Home in additional sizes and products.

entry.title: 2 oz sample
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 2 oz Candle
Price: 8.00

Our mini 2 oz jar Mason Jar Candles are poured with YOUR fragrance of choice to add a perfect touch of modern farmhouse flare to any home. These candles make amazing gifts for friends and family, or to treat yourself!

BURN TIME: Up to 15 hours of burn time. 
 
INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials. 

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans. 
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!) 
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks. 
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

DIMENSIONS: 2.25" x 2.25" x 2" 

Looking for a larger size? Enjoy all your favorite scents in 16 oz candles.
